com.vgrs.xcode.common
Class UnicodeMatrix

java.lang.Object
  com.vgrs.xcode.common.UnicodeMatrix

public class UnicodeMatrix
extends java.lang.Object

Implements a single Unicode Plane as a matrix of boolean flags 8K in size.

Author:
jcolosi
